description:
Haruna and Kirishima have been asked by Dr. Osakabe to become friends with Makie. However, fearing that Makie may fall into the Fog`s hands, Assistant Secretary Kamikage has ordered an assault by special forces. Haruna tries to protect Makie, but their tenuous friendship is jeopardized when Makie learns of Haruna`s true nature...
Source: crunchyroll
